member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.ParallelCNC.WriteRegister(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Writes to the daisylink register specified by the address. Does not allow writing to the reserved registers.
member.param: Address of the register.
Byte to write.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.ParallelCNC.ReadRegister(System.Byte)
member.summary: Reads a byte from the specified register. Allows reading of reserved registers.
member.param: Address of the register.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.ParallelCNC.MoveMotor(Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.ParallelCNC.Axis,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Moves the motor associated with the specified axis.
member.remarks: Calling this function on a motor that is already moving will cancel its current movement and set a new target position.
member.param: The axis to move.
The number of steps to move.
Determines the direction of the motor.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.ParallelCNC.EnableMotor(Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.ParallelCNC.axisMask)
member.summary: Enable the motor associated with the specified axis.
member.param: The axis to enable.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.ParallelCNC.DisableMotor(Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.ParallelCNC.axisMask)
member.summary: Disable the motor associated with the specified axis.
member.param: The axis to diable.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.ParallelCNC.TerminateMovements
member.summary: Stops all motors and clears all step counters.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.ParallelCNC.EmergencyStop(System.Boolean)
member.param: If true, on stop the motors will lock into place.
